name: api-gateway
failure_check_reason: High latency or auth failures impact all incoming requests

name: auth-service
failure_check_reason: Token validation failures or DB connectivity issues

name: user-service
failure_check_reason: Cache misses or downstream notification delays

name: database-service
failure_check_reason: High disk I/O, slow queries, or connection exhaustion

name: notification-service
failure_check_reason: Third-party provider downtime or message queue backlog

name: email-service
failure_check_reason: SMTP provider rate limiting or credential expiry

name: sms-service
failure_check_reason: External SMS gateway latency or quota limits

name: admin-dashboard
failure_check_reason: Auth issues or stale metrics from backend services
